text: Gareth Ward (born 17 January 1974) is a British diplomat. He is currently the British Ambassador to Vietnam. Ward was made the ambassador in 2018. Ward was in a video against human trafficking in 2017. He said that people shouldn't trust human traffickers. == References == Category:Living people Category:1974 births Category:British diplomats Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom
title: Gareth Ward
